summary: Quebec City, officially called Qu√©bec, is the capital of the Canadian province of Quebec. It has about 550,000 people in the city and over 800,000 in its metropolitan area. It's the 12th largest city in Canada and has a humid continental climate with warm summers and cold, snowy winters. Founded in 1608 by explorer Samuel de Champlain, it's one of the oldest European settlements in North America. Old Quebec, with its fortified walls, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
title: Quebec City
